content: Hi, since I got this version of Zulu installed IG Publisher tries to run with the 32 bit version rather than with the 64 bit, which is installed, ending up with an out of memory error. Is there a way to force the IG Publisher to run with the 64 bit installation?
From the command line, try running "java -version". My guess is that you've had a new Java Virtual Machine installed which has the wrong version. You may need to replace it with a 64 bit version.
